attributes.action: Bring back the thin sliced loaf
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The baking industry has conned the uk into eating more bread by getting rid of the thin sliced loaf. A sandwich uses double the amount of bread. The thin sliced loaf has disappeared.We would all be abit healthier and thinner,

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
